articles.title: Poco finally teases a long-overdue successor to its fantastic F1 budget flagship - Pocketnow
articles.description: The Poco F2 will reportedly pack four rear cameras, but it won't rock a flagship Qualcomm chipset unlike its predecessor, the Poco F1.
